roleset.name: at risk of
roleset.note: VULNERABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, open-j.03. (from vulnerable.01-j)

example.name: vulnerable-jn: both args
example.text: Now that there's no need to vaccinate anyone, the entire global population is vulnerable to smallpox.
example.arg: Now that there's no need to vaccinate anyone

example.name: vulnerable-j
example.text: The Dark Core is vulnerable to the enchanted emerald bolt effect, in that it will freeze for the rest of the kill if hit.
example.arg: to the enchanted emerald bolt effect
in that it will freeze for the rest of the kill if hit
